document_data.name: ''Potion of Barkskin''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potion of barkskin''''' was a common magical [[potion]] that turned the imbiber's skin into thick but flexible tree bark that increased their armor.
document_data.Description: ''Potions of barkskin'' was of a dark color and smelled musty, like a wet forest after a pouring rain. When swirled inside its vial, it turned into tough bark like twig and back into liquid.
document_data.Powers: Consuming a bottle of a ''potion of barkskin'' was similar in effect to the spell of the same name - ''[[barkskin]]'', cast at a highly proficient level.
document_data.Creation: [[Salt]]s of tree bark were extracted from [[wood woad]] bark. These salts were combined with a special type of alchemical suspension to brew ''elixirs of barkskin.''
